title: Availing Gift Card and an Offer together : BookMyShow Support Centre
category: BookMyShow Gift Card : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
Can I use a Gift card & avail an offer in one transaction?
We want all possible discounts in one go, don't we? Unfortunately, you'll be able to avail of either debit/credit offer or use the gift card in a transaction.
As for debit/credit card offer you need to make the remaining payment via the same card.
However, you can club a gift card with a cashback/non-card offer and grab it.
All you do is apply the gift card and pay off the balance with the desired cashback/non-card offer.
